protein.general_function: Involved in ARF guanyl-nucleotide exchange factor activity
protein.specific_function: May promote guanine-nucleotide exchange on an ARF. Promotes the activation of ARF through replacement of GDP with GTP (Potential)

go_class.description: regulation of small gtpase mediated signal transduction
regulation of ras protein signal transduction
regulation of arf protein signal transduction

reference.reference_text: Cenciarelli C, Chiaur DS, Guardavaccaro D, Parks W, Vidal M, Pagano M: Identification of a family of human F-box proteins. Curr Biol. 1999 Oct 21;9(20):1177-9.
